pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmatā dabbena mallaputtena jātiyā sattavassena arahattaṃ sacchikataṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.1.3: Yaṃ kiñci sāvakena pattabbaṃ sabbaṃ tena anuppattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.1.4: Natthi cassa kiñci uttari karaṇīyaṃ, katassa vā paticayo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.1.5: Atha kho āyasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.1.7: Yaṃ kiñci sāvakena pattabbaṃ sabbaṃ mayā anuppattaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.1.8: Natthi ca me kiñci uttari karaṇīyaṃ, katassa vā paticayo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.1.9: Kiṃ nu kho ahaṃ saṃghassa veyyāvaccaṃ kareyyan”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.1.10: Atha kho āyasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa etadahosi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.1.11: “yannūnāhaṃ saṃghassa senāsanañca paññapeyyaṃ bhattāni ca uddiseyyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.2.1: Atha kho āyasmā dabbo mallaputto sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.2.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā dabbo mallaputto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.2.3: “idha mayhaṃ, bhante, rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi mayā kho jātiyā sattavassena arahattaṃ sacchikataṃ, yaṃ kiñci sāvakena pattabbaṃ, sabbaṃ mayā anupattaṃ, natthi ca me kiñci uttari karaṇīyaṃ, katassa vā paticayo, kiṃ nu kho ahaṃ saṃghassa veyyāvaccaṃ kareyyanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.2.5: ‘yannūnāhaṃ saṃghassa senāsanañca paññapeyyaṃ bhattāni ca uddiseyyan’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.2.6: Icchāmahaṃ, bhante, saṃghassa senāsanañca paññapetuṃ bhattāni ca uddisitun”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.2.8: Tena hi tvaṃ, dabba, saṃghassa senāsanañca paññapehi bhattāni ca uddisā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.2.9: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā dabbo mallaputto bhagavato paccassosi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.3.1: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.3.2: “tena hi, bhikkhave, saṃgho dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ senāsanapaññāpakañca bhattuddesakañca sammannatu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.3.5: Yācitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṃgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.3.7: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ saṃgho āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ senāsanapaññāpakañca bhattuddesakañca sammanneyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.3.10: Saṃgho āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ senāsanapaññāpakañca bhattuddesakañca sammannati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.3.11: Yassāyasmato khamati āyasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa senāsanapaññāpakassa ca bhattuddesakassa ca sammuti, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.3.13: Sammato saṃghena āyasmā dabbo mallaputto senāsanapaññāpako ca bhattuddesako ca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.4.1: Sammato ca panāyasmā dabbo mallaputto sabhāgānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ekajjhaṃ senāsanaṃ paññapeti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.4.2: Ye te bhikkhū suttantikā tesaṃ ekajjhaṃ senāsanaṃ paññapeti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.4.4: Ye te bhikkhū vinayadharā tesaṃ ekajjhaṃ senāsanaṃ paññapeti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.4.6: Ye te bhikkhū dhammakathikā tesaṃ ekajjhaṃ senāsanaṃ paññapeti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.4.8: Ye te bhikkhū jhāyino tesaṃ ekajjhaṃ senāsanaṃ paññapeti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.4.10: Ye te bhikkhū tiracchānakathikā kāyadaḷhibahulā viharanti tesampi ekajjhaṃ senāsanaṃ paññapeti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.4.12: Yepi te bhikkhū vikāle āgacchanti tesampi tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā teneva ālokena senāsanaṃ paññapeti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.4.15: Te āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadanti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.4.17: Te āyasmā dabbo mallaputto evaṃ vadeti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.4.20: “amhākaṃ, āvuso dabba, gijjhakūṭe pabbate senāsanaṃ paññapehi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.4.22: Amhākaṃ, āvuso, isigilipasse kāḷasilāyaṃ senāsanaṃ paññapehi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.4.23: Amhākaṃ, āvuso, vebhārapasse sattapaṇṇiguhāyaṃ senāsanaṃ paññapehi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.4.24: Amhākaṃ, āvuso, sītavane sappasoṇḍikapabbhāre senāsanaṃ paññapehi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.4.30: Amhākaṃ, āvuso, maddakucchismiṃ migadāye senāsanaṃ paññapehī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.4.31: Tesaṃ āyasmā dabbo mallaputto tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā aṅguliyā jalamānāya purato purato gacchati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.4.32: Tepi teneva ālokena āyasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa piṭṭhito piṭṭhito gacchanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.4.33: Tesaṃ āyasmā dabbo mallaputto evaṃ senāsanaṃ paññapeti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.4.34: “ayaṃ mañco, idaṃ pīṭhaṃ, ayaṃ bhisi, idaṃ bibbohanaṃ, idaṃ vaccaṭṭhānaṃ, idaṃ passāvaṭṭhānaṃ, idaṃ pānīyaṃ, idaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ, ayaṃ kattaradaṇḍo,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.4.35: idaṃ saṃghassa katikasaṇṭhānaṃ, imaṃ kālaṃ pavisitabbaṃ, imaṃ kālaṃ nikkhamitabban”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.4.36: Tesaṃ āyasmā dabbo mallaputto evaṃ senāsanaṃ paññapetvā punadeva veḷuvanaṃ paccāgacchati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.5.1: Tena kho pana samayena mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū navakā ceva honti appapuññā ca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.5.2: Yāni saṃghassa lāmakāni senāsanāni tāni tesaṃ pāpuṇanti lāmakāni ca bhattāni.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.5.3: Tena kho pana samayena rājagahe manussā icchanti therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abhisaṅkhārikaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ dātuṃ sappimpi telampi uttaribhaṅgampi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.5.4: Mettiyabhūmajakānaṃ pana bhikkhūnaṃ pākatikaṃ denti yathārandhaṃ kaṇājakaṃ bilaṅgadutiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.5.5: Te pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantā there bhikkhū pucchanti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.5.6: “tumhākaṃ, āvuso, bhattagge kiṃ ahosi? Tumhākaṃ, āvuso, bhattagge kiṃ ahosī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.5.8: “amhākaṃ, āvuso, sappi ahosi telaṃ ahosi uttaribhaṅgaṃ ahosī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.5.10: “amhākaṃ, āvuso, na kiñci ahosi, pākatikaṃ yathārandhaṃ kaṇājakaṃ bilaṅgadutiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.6.1: Tena kho pana samayena kalyāṇabhattiko gahapati saṃghassa catukkabhattaṃ deti niccabhattaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.6.3: Aññe odanena pucchanti, aññe sūpena pucchanti, aññe telena pucchanti, aññe uttaribhaṅgena pucchanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.6.4: Tena kho pana samayena kalyāṇabhattikassa gahapatino bhattaṃ svātanāya mettiyabhūmajakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.6.5: Atha kho kalyāṇabhattiko gahapati ārāmaṃ agamāsi kenacideva karaṇīyena.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.6.6: So yenāyasmā dabbo mallaputto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.6.7: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho kalyāṇabhattikaṃ gahapatiṃ āyasmā dabbo mallaputto dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṃsesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.6.8: Atha kho kalyāṇabhattiko gahapati āyasmatā dabbena mallaputtena dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṃsito āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.6.9: “kassa, bhante, amhākaṃ ghare svātanāya bhattaṃ uddiṭṭhan”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.6.10: “Mettiyabhūmajakānaṃ kho, gahapati, bhikkhūnaṃ tumhākaṃ ghare svātanāya bhattaṃ uddiṭṭhan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.6.11: Atha kho kalyāṇabhattiko gahapati anattamano ahosi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.6.14: “ye, je, sve bhattikā āgacchanti te koṭṭhake āsanaṃ paññapetvā kaṇājakena bilaṅgadutiyena parivisā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.6.15: “Evaṃ, ayyā”ti kho sā dāsī kalyāṇabhattikassa gahapatino paccassosi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.7.2: “hiyyo kho, āvuso, amhākaṃ kalyāṇabhattikassa gahapatino bhattaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.7.3: sve amhe kalyāṇabhattiko gahapati saputtadāro upatiṭṭhitvā parivisissati;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.7.4: aññe odanena pucchissanti, aññe sūpena pucchissanti, aññe telena pucchissanti, aññe uttaribhaṅgena pucchissantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.7.5: Te teneva somanassena na cittarūpaṃ rattiyā supiṃsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.7.6: Atha kho mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaraṃ ādāya yena kalyāṇabhattikassa gahapatino nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkamiṃsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.7.7: Addasā kho sā dāsī mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū dūratova āgacchante. Disvāna koṭṭhake āsanaṃ paññapetvā mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.7.10: “nissaṃsayaṃ kho na tāva bhattaṃ siddhaṃ bhavissati. Yathā mayaṃ koṭṭhake nisīdeyyāmā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.7.11: Atha kho sā dāsī kaṇājakena bilaṅgadutiyena upagacchi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.7.15: Api cāhaṃ hiyyova gahapatinā āṇattā— ‘ye, je, sve bhattikā āgacchanti te koṭṭhake āsanaṃ paññapetvā kaṇājakena bilaṅgadutiyena parivisā’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.7.18: “hiyyo kho, āvuso, kalyāṇabhattiko gahapati ārāmaṃ agamāsi dabbassa mallaputtassa santike.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.7.19: Nissaṃsayaṃ kho mayaṃ dabbena mallaputtena gahapatino antare paribhinnā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.7.20: Te teneva domanassena na cittarūpaṃ bhuñjiṃsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.7.21: Atha kho mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantā ārāmaṃ gantvā pattacīvaraṃ paṭisāmetvā bahārāmakoṭṭhake saṅghāṭipallatthikāya nisīdiṃsu tuṇhībhūtā maṅkubhūtā pattakkhandhā adhomukhā pajjhāyantā appaṭibhānā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.8.1: Atha kho mettiyā bhikkhunī yena mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.8.5: tatiyampi kho mettiyā bhikkhunī mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.8.10: “Tathā hi pana tvaṃ, bhagini, amhe dabbena mallaputtena viheṭhīyamāne ajjhupekkhasī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.8.12: “Sace kho tvaṃ, bhagini, iccheyyāsi ajjeva bhagavā dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ nāsāpeyyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.8.13: “Kyāhaṃ, ayyā, karomi, kiṃ mayā sakkā kātun”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.8.14: “Ehi tvaṃ, bhagini, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkama; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ evaṃ vadehi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.8.16: Yāyaṃ, bhante, disā abhayā anītikā anupaddavā sāyaṃ disā sabhayā saītikā saupaddavā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.8.20: “Evaṃ, ayyā”ti kho mettiyā bhikkhunī mettiyabhūmajakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.8.21: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho sā mettiyā bhikkhunī bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.8.23: Yāyaṃ, bhante, disā abhayā anītikā anupaddavā sāyaṃ disā sabhayā saītikā saupaddavā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.9.1: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṃghaṃ sannipātāpetvā āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.9.2: “sarasi tvaṃ, dabba, evarūpaṃ kattā yathāyaṃ bhikkhunī āhā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.9.5: tatiyampi kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.9.6: “sarasi tvaṃ, dabba, evarūpaṃ kattā yathāyaṃ bhikkhunī āhā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.9.11: “Yato ahaṃ, bhante, jāto nābhijānāmi supinantenapi methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevitā, pageva jāgaro”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.9.15: Idaṃ vatvā bhagavā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ pāvisi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.9.16: Atha kho te bhikkhū mettiyaṃ bhikkhuniṃ nāsesuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.9.17: Atha kho mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū te bhikkhū etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.9.20: Amhehi sā ussāhitā kupitehi anattamanehi cāvanādhippāyehī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.9.21: “Kiṃ pana tumhe, āvuso, āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.9.23: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.9.24: “kathañhi nāma mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsessantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.9.25: Atha kho te bhikkhū mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.9.26: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.9.29: “kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsessatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.9.31: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.9.32: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ duṭṭho doso appatīto amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃseyya—‘appeva nāma naṃ imamhā brahmacariyā cāveyyan’ti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.9.33: tato aparena samayena samanuggāhīyamāno vā asamanuggāhīyamāno vā amūlakañceva taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ hoti bhikkhu ca dosaṃ patiṭṭhāti, saṃghādiseso”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:2.10: tena ca kopena tena ca dosena tāya ca anattamanatāya tāya ca anabhiraddhiyā appatīto hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:2.17: Appeva nāma naṃ imamhā brahmacariyā cāveyyanti
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:2.18: bhikkhubhāvā cāveyyaṃ, samaṇadhammā cāveyyaṃ, sīlakkhandhā cāveyyaṃ, tapoguṇā cāveyyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:2.20: yasmiṃ khaṇe anuddhaṃsito hoti taṃ khaṇaṃ taṃ layaṃ taṃ muhuttaṃ vītivatte.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:2.22: yena vatthunā anuddhaṃsito hoti tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ samanuggāhīyamāno.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:2.26: cattāri adhikaraṇāni— vivādādhikaraṇaṃ, anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ, āpattādhikaraṇaṃ, kiccādhikaraṇaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:2.28: tucchakaṃ mayā bhaṇitaṃ, musā mayā bhaṇitaṃ, abhūtaṃ mayā bhaṇitaṃ, ajānantena mayā bhaṇitaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:3.1.2: Tañce codeti—“diṭṭho mayā, pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpannosi,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:3.1.4: natthi tayā saddhiṃ uposatho vā pavāraṇā vā saṃghakammaṃ vā”ti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:3.1.8: Tañce codeti—“suto mayā, pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpannosi,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:3.1.10: natthi tayā saddhiṃ uposatho vā pavāraṇā vā saṃghakammaṃ vā”ti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:3.1.14: Tañce codeti—“parisaṅkito mayā, pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpannosi,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:3.1.16: natthi tayā saddhiṃ uposatho vā pavāraṇā vā saṃghakammaṃ vā”ti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:3.2.2: Tañce codeti—“diṭṭho mayā suto ca, pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpannosi,
